video_prompt: A female dancer moves with powerful, expressive grace. Her long hair dynamically cascades as she lunges, extending her limbs. Her focused expression is captured as vibrant, abstract paint splatters and drips explosively burst from her body and flowing pants with each motion, dynamically altering the plain background. These bursts of color emphasize the energy and artistic style.
image_prompt:
Here are a few options, ranging from more concise to slightly more detailed, depending on the desired level of control:

**Option 1 (Most Concise):**
Vibrant watercolor and ink painting of a dynamic, expressive female dancer in mid-movement. She wears a black sports bra, baggy dark track pants with multicolored abstract paint splashes and white stripes, and white sneakers. Long, flowing dark hair, delicate downcast face. Minimalist light off-white background with scattered colorful paint splatters, visible brushstrokes, and fluid washes.

**Option 2 (Slightly More Detail on Pose/Style):**
Vibrant watercolor and ink painting of a dynamic, expressive female dancer in a powerful lunging pose with extended limbs. She wears a black sports bra, baggy dark track pants stylized with a burst of vibrant, multicolored abstract paint splashes and white stripes, and white sneakers. Her long, flowing dark brown hair cascades with colorful specks around a delicate, realistic downcast face. Minimalist light off-white background with scattered colorful paint splatters and drips. Features visible brushstrokes, fluid washes, and high contrast between realism and abstraction.

**Option 3 (Focusing on Artistic Contrast):**
Watercolor and ink painting of a female dancer in dynamic mid-movement, blending realism and abstraction. A delicate, realistic face with downcast gaze contrasts with the abstract, expressive body. She wears a black sports bra, baggy dark track pants exploding with vibrant, multicolored paint splashes (purples, pinks, blues, yellows, reds) and white stripes, plus white sneakers. Her long, flowing dark hair contains subtle colorful specks. Minimalist light off-white background with energetic paint splatters. Visible brushstrokes and fluid washes create an ethereal, vibrant aesthetic.
refined_video_prompt: A female dancer moves with powerful, expressive grace, her long hair dynamically cascading as she lunges, extending limbs. Her focused expression subtly shifts with the intense choreography. Vibrant, abstract paint splatters and drips explosively burst from her body and flowing pants with each motion, dynamically transforming the background. These colorful explosions emphasize her energetic, artistic style.
